topic.title: Configure Qodana
topic.p: This section contains reference pages to help you configure %product% for your needs. These pages cover only general configuration parameters.
Generally, you can configure %product% on two levels explored in these sections:

list.li: The section explains how to configure %product% inspection process. This includes such topics as what inspections to use, what files and directories to inspect, how to configure license inspection.
The section explains how to configure %product% Docker image for specific tasks and needs, and provides basic use-cases when these options may come in handy.

topic.tip: Configuration and using %product% with various CI/CD systems is covered by the section.
